information_for_contributors: Any changes made to this file should be ported over to token-patterns.ts
name: Ren'Py

patterns.comment: Match begin and end of python one line statements
Type the first name as a variable (Probably not needed, but python doesn't seem to catch it)
patterns.name: variable.other.renpy

patterns.comment: position props (int, absolute, or a float)
patterns.name: support.type.property-name.transform.renpy

patterns.comment: ('\(int, int, int, int\)' | '\(float, float, float, float\)' | None)
patterns.name: support.type.property-name.transform.renpy

label-call.comment: Note: label params are only allowed at the end of the access expression
label-call.name: meta.function-call.label.renpy

label-access.comment: Note: Labels can't be nested twice in a row!
label-access.name: meta.member.access.label.renpy

label-def-name.comment: Note: Labels can't be nested twice in a row!

patterns.comment: [TODO: Should probably only be a keyword in the expression] Renpy sub expression keywords
patterns.name: keyword.other.renpy

hex_literal.comment: Note: This pattern has no end check. Only use as include pattern!

patterns.comment: Valid tags with numeric params (close required)
Valid tags with numeric params (close required)
Unknown tag (Single line support only cus \R does not work) (Since we don't know if a tag is self closing, we can't assume that an end pattern exists)
